name: Yawar Abass
title: Frontend Developer & AI Enthusiast
summary: Creative and detail-oriented frontend developer with a strong passion for crafting visually appealing and performant web applications. Experienced in building scalable, interactive UIs using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Exploring AI-powered features for smarter web experiences.

experience.description: Developed a content-driven website using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS integrated with WordPress as a headless CMS. Implemented responsive layouts, reusable UI components, and SEO optimizations for fast global indexing. Collaborated with designers to build modern UI/UX using HTML, CSS, and shadcn/ui.

Built a dynamic marketing platform using Next.js, React, and Sanity CMS. Integrated analytics, improved SEO meta-tags, and implemented shadcn/ui components for a consistent design system. Focused on performance and responsive design with Tailwind CSS and JavaScript.

Developed multiple small-scale web applications such as an AI image enhancer, blog CMS, and e-commerce prototype. Used Next.js with MongoDB, Express.js, and Prisma ORM. Implemented authentication using Clerk and deployed on Vercel.

Built an AI-powered image SaaS platform using Next.js, React, and Cloudinary APIs. Added features such as background removal, recoloring, and restoration using AI. Integrated Stripe for payments and implemented responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and TypeScript.

experience.company: Academic Research Project – Cervical Cancer Classification
experience.description: Worked on a deep learning project using PyTorch and Python for cervical cell image classification. Implemented CNN and Vision Transformer architectures, achieving 92% accuracy. Presented research findings at academic symposiums.
Contributed to open-source projects related to Next.js, React UI components, and AI APIs. Improved documentation, optimized accessibility, and refactored components for better maintainability.

projects.name: AI Resume Builder
projects.description: Built an AI-driven resume generator that provides real-time suggestions and automatic formatting using OpenAI API. Implemented PDF export and live preview functionality with a sleek React interface.

projects.name: Stock Vision
projects.description: Developed a stock market analysis and prediction dashboard. Visualized trends using Chart.js and implemented LSTM-based forecasting models for price prediction.

projects.name: NextAuth Demo App
projects.description: Created a secure authentication demo using NextAuth.js with Google OAuth and JWT session management. Designed the frontend using Tailwind CSS and implemented responsive layouts with HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Portfolio & Blog Platform
projects.description: Developed a personal portfolio and blogging platform integrated with Sanity CMS for content management. Focused on SEO, responsive design, and modular UI components using React and Tailwind CSS.

education.details: Focused on full-stack development, AI/ML, and cloud computing. Completed major projects on deep learning and web architecture.

education.university: Islamia College of Science and Commerce
education.details: Built multiple academic projects using Java, MySQL, and Python. Participated in hackathons and web design competitions.
Specialized in Physics, Chemistry, and Computer Science. Developed an early interest in programming and web development.

awards.name: Top 10 Projects – DeveloperWeek Hackathon
awards.description: Recognized for creating an innovative AI image enhancement tool using Next.js and Cloudinary APIs.

awards.name: Best Research Presentation – AI in Healthcare
awards.description: Awarded for a project on cervical cancer image classification using Vision Transformers.
